summary: Project to add rich text/markup preview tools for centered, large, extra-large, extra-small, spoiler, and underlined text.

existing_features.title:
Extend the document preview renderer used in the main session panel (selected element XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]) so that plain-text content renders additional lightweight markup patterns in preview mode (without altering stored content):
- "[C] text" renders as centered text in preview
- "[B] text" renders as large text in preview
- "# text" renders as extra-large heading text in preview
- "-# text" renders as extra-small text in preview
- "||text||" renders as spoiler/hidden text that can be clicked/tapped to reveal in preview
- "__text__" (including when used like "- __text__") renders as underlined text in preview
This must work anywhere text is rendered inside DocumentContentPreview (including when mixed with existing [FILE:id:name] markers), and should apply to both session documents and player documents since both use the same preview component.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add markup/formatting tools for preview: [C] centered, [B] large, # extra-large heading, -# extra-small, ||spoiler|| hidden text reveal, and __underlined__
